description: Chiaki Sakaguchi appears to be a sociable, popular high school senior, but he carries a dark secret with him that he can tell no one about – not even his closest friends. When Chiaki meets fellow student Eiji Yukimura – an under-achieving social misfit – for the first time, he believes he’s found someone who can understand his inner pain. As the two become closer, Chiaki learns that Eiji has a secret also – a secret so dark, it threatens to overshadow his own. United by common dysfunction and angst, Chiaki and Eiji begin to search for pleasure together beyond their pain. Will the pair’s growing bond enable them to break free of their troubled pasts and create a brighter future? Or is the damage that’s been done to both of them beyond any healing that love can provide?
name: Vol. 1

description: Poor Onizuka is misunderstood. At a towering 6’ 2” with long hair and a stubbly beard, his very presence sends most of his classmates scrambling in terror. And with a name that sounds like he is the son of a mob boss, Onizuka has a hard time blending into class. While Onizuka looks and sometimes acts like a bear, he is really a puppy at heart and is secretly hoping that the object of his affection will notice him. So when he is not running into walls and doors due to his poor eyesight, he is staring longingly at Kisaki, a fellow classmate. Will Onizuka ever work up the courage to confess to Kisaki his feelings?
name: Vol. 1

description:
Akimoto has just started his high school career at Miya High and is burning with enthusiasm; he is overjoyed to finally be able to meet his long time Judo idol Saitou! Akimoto has watched Saitou ever since his middle school days, but the real Saitou isn’t matching up to the Saitou of Akimoto’s dreams. Foul mouthed, with a bad attitude and superiority complex, Saitou has decided to use Akimoto’s admiration against him and turn him into his slave. Saitou also hides a dark secret, and when it's revealed, what will Akimoto think of him then?

Contents

  • Dash!
  • Accelerate
  • Up!
  • Cheeky 1
  • Cheeky 2
  • Cheeky 3
  • Restart
name: Vol. 1

description: When law student Masahiro Matsunaga has his eye caught by the beautiful, seductive Takane, it’s lust at first sight. No matter what, Masahiro simply must bed his gorgeous classmate, even if it amounts to a one-night fling. After discovering his goal was easier to achieve than he’d realized, Masahiro finds he’s in another dilemma – once is not enough! It becomes all Takane all the time as far as Masahiro is concerned, but the object of his obsession has no lack of other “sex friends”. For Takane, committing to one lover is a ridiculous proposition, one he’d never consider, unless Masahiro can make the case for monogamy. Is it possible for animal lust to grow into true love?
name: Vol. 1

description:
Uka is counting down the hours, waiting for the day he becomes a butterfly. Although he has been diagnosed with a life-threatening disease, Uka doesn’t believe that this is the end. He knows a day will come when he will be free to flutter and fly as a butterfly.Watching silently from the shadows is the mysterious Mikami. Mikami “senses” that Uka is nearing his end. He knows that falling in love with a boy who is about to pass away is hopeless but he cannot help himself. Will Mikami’s love be strong enough to keep Uka’s butterfly wings grounded?

Contents

  • The Day I Become a Butterfly
  • You At the End
  • The Lonely War
  • Blue Cat Tunnel
  • Tokyo Alien Ulala
  • Planet Yours
  • Ending
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: The Day I Become a Butterfly

description: One fateful day, rambunctious teenager Hirofumi wakes up to discover two years of his memories are gone! Even more surprising, he learns that in those two years, he’s been romantically involved with the moody and handsome Daigo! At first he refuses to believe in their affair, but as time goes on, he realizes he can’t bear the thought of losing Daigo’s smile. When he finds a letter he wrote to himself to explain the situation, will he finally be able to accept Daigo’s love?
name: Vol. 1

description: Having lost their parents, Shiroyama must put aside his dreams and work hard to support not only himself, but his younger brother and sister. He steps into a world that he knows he must guard himself safely from, to protect himself and the ones he cares for. A world where transvestites work at entertaining patrons and alcohol flows freely. A world that offers him many firsts, including a kiss. But is it enough to light the fires of romance into his cold heart?
name: Vol. 1

description: A quiet and shy member of the school's art club, Toru is quite a contrast to his best friend Ryoji, who is a handsome, loud and brash jock. Toru has harbored a crush on Ryoji for the longest time, but hasn't confessed his feelings for fear of rejection. But from out of the blue, Ryoji suddenly admits that he gets "aroused" whenever he looks at Toru. Curious about this feeling, Ryoji proposes that he and Toru sleep together. Though appalled at the thought of having casual sex, Toru's attraction towards Ryoji makes the proposition enticing nevertheless. Will Toru's secret desire for Ryoji compel him to accept his friend's sexual overtures?
name: Vol. 1

description: Good-natured Kosugi never dreamed he’d be so gung-ho about a lowly gig as a customer service rep. But the pay is pretty fantastic…and his boss, the overbearing but handsome Ogata, sure makes punching the clock a pleasure! Now, Kosugi must brave hostile callers, a flirty co-worker and even a bout of life-or-death illness (or maybe just a cold) for the chance to make a direct love-connection with his office crush!
name: Vol. 1

description:
Ossessione, parte 1

Haunted, War of Kings: Darkhawk # 1 (April 2009)

Ossessione, parte 2

untitled, War of Kings: Darkhawk # 2 (May 2009)

Materia oscura

Dark Matters: The Secret of the Darkhawks, Part 1, War of Kings: Ascension # 1 (June 2009)

Nulla e vuoto

Null and Void, War of Kings: Ascension # 2 (July 2009)

La fine di tutte le cose

The End of All Things, War of Kings: Ascension # 3 (August 2009)

Fuggiasco

Fugitive, War of Kings: Ascension # 4 (September 2009)
name: War of Kings 4

description: Makoto has always looked up to his cool older cousin, Toshi. After all, it was the movie-obsessed Toshi that told him to never settle for being a boring adult. But now that Makoto's a teenager, he senses a big change in Toshi's outlook. Could it be that his freedom-loving cousin has given up on his dream of making movies? Only a look back into the highs and lows of Toshi's wild days with his school's Film Club can part the curtains on this made-for-the-big-screen mystery!
name: Vol. 1

description: The Film Club’s next major project is in the works, and Kaji and his crazy friends must band together to write, shoot, act and edit! But with shy Nakamura stumbling into Kaji's bed, will Kaji be able to figure out what his true feelings for Nakamura are without jeopardizing the shoot?
name: Vol. 2

description: The only thing keeping Tadashi, a struggling song lyricist, alive is food handouts from Kouhei, a successful doctor. In fact, Tadashi has been leeching off of Kouhei for practically their entire professional lives. But Kouhei’s parents want nothing more than to see their son settling down. As Kouhei is pushed ever more forcefully into an arranged marriage, will he finally admit that he sees Tadashi as something more than just a friend?
name: Vol. 1

description: Kou is staying at the dorm of Seiran Academy High School to prevent himself from acting on his love for his sweet and meek stepbrother Naruki. But Naruki follows him to Seiran! When Kou's friend Yoshino hypnotizes Naruki to make him more aggressive-Naruki ends up with a split personality "seme-Naruki" who shows up when he's aroused! What's poor Kou to do?
name: Vol. 1

description: Little Tatsuhiko, says to his young family servant Itaru,"when I grow up, I want to become a politician and change the law - so two men can get married. Will you marry me then?” Ten years later, Tatsuhiko leaves a mysterious note behind and disappears from his prestigious academy. Itaru is asked to find him, only to discover that time changes people and learns that things aren’t the way they used to be... From Yugi Yamada, creator of Close The Last Door and Laugh Under The Sun!
name: Vol. 1

description:
College mates Shinobu Miura and Eiichi Tashiro have more going on between them than classes and studies – close proximity and animal attraction can create strange bedfellows – but they also have little-to-nothing in common. Shinobu wallows in denial of any feelings he may have, while Eiichi is eager for a commitment. When Eiichi accepts an offer to work overseas for an American photographer, will Shinobu realize too late how much two opposites can make a perfect duo?

Contents

  • The Neighbor's Lie
  • Natural
  • Two Apart
  • Somewhere Today
  • Only In Those Eyes
  • Duetto
  • Secret 1
  • Secret 2
  • Glasses + He
  • Step By Step
  • Profiles
  • Kujyou's Comments
name: Vol. 1

description: On the two-year anniversary of the death of his mother, Masaki Kuzumi returns to the beautiful manor home where she once lived. There, he meets the kind, devoted dog trainer Yuu Kanai and instantly responds to the younger man’s sweet nature…but something behind Yuu’s smile hints at a secret darkness that Kuzumi knows all too well. Can these two men band together and shine the light of forgiveness on all of their past regrets?
name: Vol. 1

description: When Akira and his younger brother's mother suddenly dies, the father they had never known sends his right-hand man, Hyougami to retrieve the two to live with him. Their father turns out to be the chairman of the powerful Kasuga group-a company that rules everything with their influence, including the new life of the brothers. Akira soon finds out his life is being controlled by Hyougami-and Hyougami will use everything in his arsenal to get what he wants.
name: Vol. 1

description: Christmas pantomimes are a great favorite among English kids: they're are a classic fairytale-like show of clowning, music and magic, which the kids themselves are encouraged to act out. Denham's new pantomime is twice as special as usual, because it's going to be put on in the legendary "Victoria Theatre", which has been boarded up for over half a century, and also because it's going to feature a special appearance by Harlequin, a character who's virtually disappeared from the British tradition. Not many remember that more than a century ago Harlequin was acted by the great mimic Joanathan Gann, who committed suicide after the mysterious disappearance of several little actors. Then for decades the "Victoria" was considered as a theatre with a curse on it. It's been completely rebuilt since then. But can there possibly still be a few ghosts skulking around, lurking in its corridors, and could it really be that behind its painted backcloth you can cross the threshold into a wondrous and terrifying world? Given that after Jonathan Gann's demise some of his accusers were found to have practically bled to death, the mystery of Denham could be a job for expert vampire-killers like Harlan Draka and Dean Barrymore…
name: Harlequin

description: Every large and historical city has corners where the past left its vestiges, places full of a peculiar character. Paris prides herself with several “magic spots”, and the person who’d be able to control them all would gain great power. Maître Abel, a.k.a. the Taxidermist, an admirer and follower of alchemist Aleister Crowley, is a collector of “magic spots” in Paris. The only one who always eluded him is the richest in magical and evil power: the mysterious Rue du Sortilège. Abel is determined to find out where the enchanted street is, to bring the beautiful vampire Araxe de Kercadio there, and subjugate her to his will. Only Victor, anarchist poet and friend of Harlan Draka, know where Araxe is hiding. To force him to betray his immortal lover, Abel will show Victor the true, hideous face of Araxe, in an adventure that takes place in the hidden and most colourful corners of the Rive Gauche, along the streets of the ancient Latin Quarter…
name: Via del Sortilegio

description: Prague has become the capital of low-cost B-movies. Former special agent Vera Bendix works as a history consultant in a studio where wartime London has been recreated. When a horrible and mysterious ghost starts killing extras and members of the film crew – while an old song plays – Vera and Harlan Draka are involved in an escalation of terror. One of them could be facing extreme danger!
name: L'Aviatore fantasma

description: Himeko and Shibui not only work for the same company, but had also attended university together. Himeko was wildly popular, and nicknamed "The Prince". But whatever Shibui may be trying not to recall about their shared past, one thing is certain. Their present and future are tangled together, with the past knotting it quite firmly. Seeing Himeko everyday, Shibui finds his feelings ever more swayed. "Whatever it takes to get you..." June Manga presents mangaka Kikuko Kikuya's English language debut with this tale of office romance!
name: Vol. 1

description:
Tells of Kaisa and Christoffer Leka becoming discibles of a guru, in an honest and delightful way.

There are two versions of the book that have the exact same story, but with different colors. One is blue, black and white, and the other is pink, black and white.

An autobiography.
name: Your name is Krishangi.

description:
True love knows no bounds-or no boundaries as it turns out! Successful, good-looking Youji only has eyes for Noboru. For 20 years, he's stalked his target of affection relentlessly...showing up at Noboru's work unannounced, sabotaging his relationships and otherwise being a pain in the you-know-where. Will he ever get the message? Noboru's not interested in him-how many ways can he possibly say it?! But is sheer, uncompromising determination the key to love?

Contents

  • Everlasting Love
  • Never Give Up Love!
  • My Sweet Home
  • I Found A Twinkling Star
  • Naive Love Triangle
  • A Town In the Evening
  • My Sweet Room
  • Afterword
name: Vol. 1

description: Eight years ago, Kaoru Miyagi was a struggling bartender with only a middle school education, until a kind benefactor took him under his wing and gave Miyagi a job at Tokyo’s classy “Tachibana” restaurant. Now, Miyagi manages the Tachibana, and his loyalty to the one who gave him his big career break might be growing into stronger feelings. Enter Kasuga – a new chef from a sister restaurant, who takes an immediate, enthusiastic liking to Miyagi. Why should Miyagi pay any attention at all to someone as immature as Kasuga? Unless… the impulsive chef has answers about Miyagi’s past that could point to a future beyond his wildest dreams!
name: Vol. 1

description: At first, Yamashita thinks that being attracted to the same sex is normal behavior for boys at the age of 17 – a stage that everyone grows out of. But things change when he receives chocolates on Valentine’s Day...from a boy! Since then, Yamashita has begun to question his sexuality and becomes increasingly aware of his growing attraction to Kubo. Will he risk his friendship with Kubo just to express his feelings?
name: Vol. 1

description: Feverish raises temperatures with the scandalous stories of two sets of lovers. Impulsive Chihiro and earnest Kensei have a long way to go before they see eye-to-eye...but all signs point to a love connection that’s worth skipping work! Meanwhile, the talented silversmith Ari has attracted the bold, arrogant model Yoh. Each story is guaranteed to bring the heat!
name: Vol. 1

description: While out on assignment trying to document the illegal activities of the Japanese underworld, photographer Takaba crosses paths with the dark and mysterious leader Asami. Asami takes Takaba captive, in an attempt to subjugate and possess him. But when the son of the Chinese mafia enters demanding evidence that Takaba may have, will Takaba be able to survive being caught in the crosshairs of a deadly underworld feud?
name: Target in the Viewfinder

description: “Akihito, never forget that you belong to me.”  When Akihito’s obsession with the perfect shot lands him out of his depth and deep in a criminal trap, who should come to his rescue but…Asami?!  But Asami’s own mysterious past soon surfaces once the tale of his fateful first meeting with the gorgeous (and violent) Fei Long is revealed!  When the ties that bind begin to unravel, which of these men will strike up a new allegiance…or choose to stand on their own?
name: Cage in the Viewfinder

description: “You’re coming with me…even to the depths of hell.” Akihito is finally ready to let down his guard and face his complicated feelings for Asami. But just as the two men surrender to the sweet push-and-pull of unrestrained lust, Akihito falls for a trap set by the ruthless (and gorgeous) Fei Long! One false move may mean lights-out for both Akihito and Asami. Will they outwit Fei Long and live to see another day…together?
name: One Wing in the Viewfinder

description: “Don’t tell me you actually believe Asami is in love with you?” Fei long taunts Akihito after abducting him to Hong Kong. Though Akihito is made to perform debasing acts during his imprisonment, the only thought he has is of the wounded Asami, who tried to protect him…
name: Prisoner in the Viewfinder

description: “Even if I die, Asami will get me back to Japan…won’t he?” Akihito remains an angry hostage in the hands of the menacing Fei Long, and although his captor has developed an obvious fondness for him, Akihito hopes beyond hope that Asami will run to his rescue! With Russian mobsters shadowing their every move, will these power-hungry men finally draw the curtain on their violent feud once and for all?
name: Truth in the Viewfinder

description: Cold clammy hands, sleepless nights, excessive sweating and nervous stuttering… almost everyone has gone through this at least once in their lives. It is the first stage of love. It is a stage Kikuchi, a bookstore attendant, must hurdle if he wants to start a relationship with Kaji, a regular client of the store. But Kikuchi’s hopes are dashed when a co-worker gossips about Kaji’s latest buy: a storybook for children. Is Kaji a family man? Is it game over already for Kikuchi when he hasn’t even cleared the first level yet?
name: Vol. 1

description: Youichi Nanase has a huge problem. His adorable little brother attends an all boys’ school – one that is rumored to have a 90% gay student population! Fearful for his brother’s “safety,” Youichi spends his nights drinking his woes away with his coworker, Renji Tsutsumi. But Youichi’s brother isn’t being pursued by his classmates; he’s the one doing the chasing and he’s finally captured the heart of his volleyball teammate. To make matters worse, Renji himself has fallen deeply for Youichi! Will Youichi finally be able to accept his brother’s relationships with men and find a love of his own in the process?
name: Vol. 1

description: You think your life is weird? Imagine being the reincarnation of an ancient priestess from a thousand years ago. That’s the unfortunate fate that has befallen Yuuto, a high school student and kendo competitor whose life is turned upside down when he is visited by a thunder god named Kazuchi. The disgruntled god claims that he is bound to Yuuto and that the only way he can be free is to have Yuuto remember something he’s never done in his lifetime! Will Yuuto be able to tap into his priestess past to remember the magic word to set the thunder god free? And if he does, would he really want the dashing Kazuchi to leave?
name: Vol. 1

description: When happy-go-lucky Shiro is suddenly murdered by a jealous lover, he finds himself summoned to heaven by the teeny-tiny (and totally bored) God Kami-Sama. The two soon hatch a plot to form a “family” featuring the beautiful ninja Kuro…but little do they know that Kuro has his own troubled past! Will these three lonely misfits find a way to overcome their differences and forge a lasting bond?
name: Vol. 1

description: When Kyoya, a former employee at Homura Yasobe’s host club, stumbles upon his boss' clandestine affair with Touji Karasuma, the leader of a rival Yakuza faction-Kyoya seizes upon the opportunity to blackmail Homura into going out with him. But will the cold and calculating Touji accept defeat and let his beloved Homura go?
name: Vol. 2

description: Co-workers Kai and Toga have an ongoing feud that makes them look like sworn enemies! But their snarling sarcasm barely conceals the fact that they’re wild for one another. Can a lonely, lovelorn rabbit and a ravenous wolf learn to play nice…or will they devour one another in a flurry of fur?
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Gentlemen's Agreement Between a Rabbit & a Wolf

description: Everyone thought Naoki was a little flamboyant, and he was used to getting teased for it. But when Yada glanced at him, he felt something he never had before! Ten deftly written short episodes explore the pathos, confusion, drama, passion and humor of coming out and finding one’s true self. Forbidden desire, hidden lust, jealousy and acceptance collide in this collection of wonderfully drawn, bittersweet short stories of teenage romance by author Yugi Yamada!
name: Vol. 1

description: The notoriously vicious Chinese mafia has lost its next rightful heir...to sudden suicide! Now, the esteemed "God of Dogs" Tsai family must race against the ticking clock and hunt down the child of the deceased eldest son in order to preserve their ancient, sacred legacy. Meanwhile, the mysterious Archer has been convicted of killing his father and is on his way to jail. What will fate reveal for the powerful Tsai clan's criminal dynasty and this strange young man?
name: Vol. 1

description: Golden Wick, a pleasant and picturesque village on Massachusetts Hills. An old acquaintance of Harlan Draka’s, canoist Esther Rothman, who’s working for an ecological campaign, is invited to give a lecture in that small town. It’s well-known that Golden Wick is the site of a coven— a congregation of harmless witches of the Wicca cult, who worship the Great White Goddess and are regularly visited by organized tourist groups from Salem. The name of the cult awakes in Harlan an old memory: “the Order of the Waning Moon”. But where did he hear it first? Maybe in a small town in Germany, called Arnstadt… Memories and premonitions build up, and Harlan is shocked by a dream where he sees Lisa, the girl enslaved by man-eating demon Thorke— the same girl Harlan was in love with, and wasn’t able to pull away from her fate on two different occasions. Is Esther in danger? What links Lisa to the young Massachusetts witch, Asenath Prynn? And why did Ljuba – the innocent child version of the corrupted Lisa – appear to one of the young witches?
name: La congrega della luna calante

description: Getting adopted by a rich family might be every boy’s dream, but for Yuuki, this unlikely reality comes with a price of its own. After the death of his mother, Yuuki discovers he’s the illegitimate son of a wealthy businessman, also deceased. The remaining Watase family consists of two older half-brothers: Masumi, a kind-hearted gentleman near Yuuki’s age, and Gai, a stoic workaholic several years his senior. Trying to fit in with a different social class proves difficult enough for Yuuki, but when hidden feelings beyond simple brotherly love start to emerge, confusion and angst truly begin to set in. Can such feelings, even between half-brothers, ever be accepted? If so, is it the outgoing Masumi who holds the key to Yuuki’s heart, or the ill-tempered Gai who will teach him the true meaning of love?
name: Vol. 1

description: Beauprè small airport, in Canada, is blocked by snow and ice, due to a terrible blizzard. Nobody can leave, Harlan and Kurjak included, who were forced to an emergency landing there. The vampire hunters aren’t the only unexpected guests. Someone is killing people in the dark… Ghostly and terrifying presences will make Beauprè a death trap…
name: Occhi di gelo

description: Florian, Ray and Lila are back in Gorgeous Carat Galaxy: Il Sacro Bosco dei Monstri! The trio decides to visit the castle of a distant relative known for its unique garden full of monstrous sculptures. However, these mysterious topiaries are more than mere decorations and hold secrets that could be deadly. When a mysterious figure begins to attack the houseguests and an unexpected blizzard keeps everyone confined to the grounds, this peaceful trip to the countryside soon becomes something out of a nightmare. Full of mystery, intrigue and murder, this case is one that will take all of Ray’s stealth and knowledge as the notorious thief Noir to solve. Will Ray and Florian escape this accursed castle alive? Or will our heroes be consumed by the mysteries surrounding this household and its peculiar garden?
name: Vol. 1

description: High on a cliff on windy Donegal coast, the House’s waiting for its new keeper. In Berlin, after receiving a mental message from her Irish friend, poet Liam O’Keefe, the German clairvoyant Ann Jurging asks Harlan to go to Ireland with her. But Liam has puzzingly disappeared, leaving only his hand-written, nightmarish diaries. What kind of monster creatures haunt the mist surrounding the House? Is it only the sound of the crashing waves that’s rumbling under the stone vaults of the House cellar? What horrors lie hidden in the dark clouds coming from the sea? And why does the view seem to change from the window, just the way it happened in the paintings of the former Keeper? When not only space, but time too, starts going crazy, Ann Jurging and Harlan Draka will face dissolution, madness and death reaching for them...
name: La casa sull’orlo del mondo

description: Ciudad Juarez, State of Chihuahua, Mexico, is a city ruled by the law of the druglords. The area has been the theatre of hundreds of unsolved murders, whose victims were young women. At a criminologists' panel, set up in Ciudad Juarez by the victims' relatives, two experts are due to speak – Edward Shirrefs, the famous investigator from Quantico FBI Academy; and Ann Spade, good-looking junior detective from the police department of Sheffield, UK, whose only entitlement seems to be her encounter with another dangerous serial killer, Jeff Carter. Acting as a self-entitled "vigilante", Carter is at the panel, incognito. But who’s his prey? The good-looking Ann, who had been his lover? Or is he perhaps trying to stop the mysterious criminal El Vampiro? Harlan, Kurjak and Tesla are in Ciudad Juarez, too, to try and understand if the unsolved crimes have been perpetrated by a Master of the Night. Wading through hot bullets and dozens of dead bodies, all the characters of this extraordinary adventure will follow the tracks of “El Vampiro”!
name: Santeria

description: Maurice Poirier was a sailor. He loved his attractive wife Anne and little Marc, his only child. He said goodbye to them for the last time, in the middle of the night, before boarding the “Petite Claire”, a ship that doesn’t exist, that nobody ever seems to have heard of. Now Maurice has disappeared, and his family is in gave danger. To trace him, Demian has to uncover the mystery of that ship. And of its terrifying, final voyage…
name: La nave fantasma

description: Mallecy is a small rural township in southern France. A quiet place, where every day is just like all the other days before it. Until, that is, until one morning a great dark cloud, as black as pitch, covers the sky, bringing a pandora’s box of agonizing screams, pain and death in its wake. But where has that cloud come from? Finding the answer to this question might cost Demian his life. And the same might be true for one of his most bitter enemies.
name: La nube nera
